Keywords: Cabal , Codex , Dark Avengers , H.A.M.M.E.R. , Politician , Power Elite , Ruler , Sinister Syndicate , Thunderbolts
Real Name: Norman Osborn
Special Powers
SECRET IDENTITY: GREEN GOBLIN, IRON PATRIOT, RED GOBLIN: When Norman Osborn would be KO'd, you may instead replace him with a Secret Identity character with a listed name on click #9. This game, when that replacement is KO'd, it scores this character's points and an additional 25 points.
I'M THE ONE IN CHARGE: Opposing characters within 4 squares can't use Mastermind.
LEADER OF H.A.M.M.E.R.: Leadership, Outwit.
